WorkItem.Description:
First of all thank you for this awesome project! I'm currently using it for a drupal project to create printable documents from nodes and it saved me a lot of time!

Currently i'm looking for a way to add html as a footer to the document.

I think it shouldn't be much efford to implement, because the classes "PHPWord_Section" and  "PHPWord_Section_Header" are providing almost the same functionality to add content.

Is there a maybe already a solution to use htmltodocx for this? How would you solve it?
WorkItem.Summary: Document header and footer from html

Comments.Message:
I'm sorry was my bad!
everything is working now! Awesome Library!
Thank you and sorry for this Issue!
